name: Necromancy: The Last Mage
description:
As the last mage it is your sworn duty to stop the horde of undead waves swarming the lands. Your last stand for all of mankind is in this forgotten cemetery. 

Note: Please use Google Chrome or MS Edge to play as Firefox will open a context menu when pressing Shift+RMB.

Use W, A, S, and D keys to move and your mouse cursor to change the look direction. Click your right mouse button to cast a fireball and left click to cast an Iceball which does less damage but slows the targets run speed. Holding shift and then clicking a mouse button will cast an AOE version of that spell type.

I hope you enjoy playing :).
